name: Die Another Day
descrpt: a 2002 spy film and the twentieth film in the James Bond series produced by Eon Productions.

name: Ice Age
descrpt: an American media franchise centering on a group of mammals surviving the Paleolithic ice age.

name: Pulp Fiction
descrpt: a 1994 American independent neo-noir crime film written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, who conceived it with Roger Avary

name: The Boss Baby
descrpt: a 2017 American computer-animated comedy film produced by DreamWorks Animation and distributed by 20th Century Fox.

name: The Hateful Eight
descrpt: a 2015 American western thriller film written and directed by Quentin Tarantino. It stars Samuel L. Jackson.

name: The Avengers
descrpt: a 2012 American superhero film based on the Marvel Comics superhero team of the same name.
